TEXT.TITLE: TRI-STAR <TRSP> BUYS CINEPLEX THEATER
TEXT.BODY: Tri-Star Pictures Inc said it agreed to acquire the Roosevelt Field Century Theatre from Canada's Cineplex Odeon Corp's RKO Century Warner Theatres Inc for 17 mln dlrs. The recently refurbished and expanded theater is located in Garden City, N.Y.. Reuter
